hero.title: Ozone — Nature's disinfection power

power.title: 300x more powerful
power.text: Ozone exceeds chlorine in disinfection efficiency by hundreds of times

pathogens.title: 99.9% pathogens
pathogens.text: Destroys bacteria, viruses, fungi and mold

residue.title: 0 residue
residue.text: Decomposes into pure oxygen in 20-30 minutes

functions.title: 7 functions in 1
functions.text: Disinfection, pest control, deodorization and more

aboutOzone.title: What is
aboutOzone.p1: Ozone (O₃) is a triatomic oxygen molecule, a powerful natural oxidizer. It is formed from atmospheric oxygen using electrical discharge.
aboutOzone.p2: Upon contact with microorganisms, ozone destroys their cell membranes, then decomposes into ordinary oxygen (O₂), leaving no harmful chemical residues.

list.safe: Safe for humans and animals after decomposition

applications.title: Areas of
applications.subtitle: Ozonation is used in various industries for disinfection, sanitization and product quality improvement

poultry.title: Poultry farming
poultry.text: Egg disinfection, feed and water treatment

food.title: Food industry
food.text: Storage of vegetables, fruits and products

medicine.title: Medicine
medicine.text: Ozonation for medical facilities provides the highest level of sterility, meeting SanPiN requirements. Effective against all types of pathogens, including chlorine-resistant viruses.

agriculture.title: Agriculture
agriculture.text: Ozonation in agriculture improves yields, extends product shelf life and ensures biosecurity. An eco-friendly alternative to chemical pesticides and preservatives.

food-production.title: Food Production
food-production.text: Ozonation in the food industry extends shelf life, ensures product safety and compliance with sanitary standards without the use of chemical additives.

horeca.title: HoReCa
horeca.text: Hotels, restaurants and cafes use ozonation to create a comfortable environment, eliminate odors and ensure high hygiene standards.

water-treatment.title: Water Treatment
water-treatment.text: Ozone is the most effective and eco-friendly water purification method. Drinking water, wastewater, pools and iron removal.

warehouses.title: Warehouses
warehouses.text: Ozonation of warehouse facilities prevents mold growth, controls odors and ensures preservation of stored goods.

disinfection.title: Disinfection
disinfection.text: Deep disinfection of premises and transport: offices, public transport, sports facilities and shopping malls.

homeArticles.title: Articles &
homeArticles.subtitle: Scientific and practical materials on ozone applications in agriculture, industry and the environment.

ozoneFoodWarehouseMeat.title: Ozone Applications in Food Warehouses and Meat Storage
ozoneFoodWarehouseMeat.excerpt: Comprehensive review of ozone technology in cold storage facilities, meat preservation, pathogen control, and adoption by major food service chains. FDA GRAS approved for direct food contact.

ozoneFoodInteraction.title: Ozone Interaction with Food Products
ozoneFoodInteraction.excerpt: Ozone as an oxidizer: effects on nutrients, bactericidal and antifungal activity, role of humidity and ethylene in food processing.

ozoneGrainProtection.title: Ozone as an environmentally safe protection for grain
ozoneGrainProtection.excerpt: Purdue University research showed that ozone effectively eliminates insects in grain storage facilities without harming grain quality or the environment.

concentratedOzoneAgriculture.title: Application of Concentrated Ozone in Agriculture
concentratedOzoneAgriculture.excerpt: Compact mobile concentrated ozone generators with capacity up to 10 kg/h enable disinfection of grain, feed, and poultry facilities in minutes instead of hours.

ozoneVirusDisinfection.title: Ozone Effects on Viruses and Bacteria
ozoneVirusDisinfection.excerpt: Mechanism of ozone's antiviral and bactericidal action: oxidative destruction of cell membranes, scientific research, and practical applications in disinfection.

ozoneCovid19Treatment.title: Potential Use of Ozone in COVID-19 Treatment
ozoneCovid19Treatment.excerpt: Official ISCO3 expert opinion on ozone therapy as adjunct treatment for SARS-CoV-2: disinfection, mechanisms of action, clinical protocols.

research.title: Scientific
research.subtitle: Ozonation effectiveness is confirmed by leading world universities

telaviv.title: Tel Aviv University
telaviv.text: Research confirmed high effectiveness of ozone against SARS-CoV-2 and COVID-19 viruses

fujita.title: FUJITA University, Japan (2020)
fujita.text: Low ozone concentrations reduce virus activity in minimal processing time

technology.pageDescription: Learn how ozonation technology works. Comparison of ozone and chlorine. 7 ozonation functions in one device.

header.title: How ozonation works
header.subtitle: Learn the principle of operation and its advantages over traditional disinfection methods

process.title: Operating
process.subtitle: Ozonation is a simple and effective 4-step process

step1.title: Ozone generation
step1.text: The ozone generator creates O₃ molecules from atmospheric oxygen using electrical discharge

step2.title: Distribution
step2.text: Ozone is distributed throughout the room or dissolved in water, reaching all surfaces

step3.title: Disinfection
step3.text: Ozone molecules contact microorganisms and destroy their cell membranes

step4.title: Decomposition
step4.text: After completion, ozone decomposes into ordinary oxygen O₂, leaving no traces

content.title: We are
content.p1: We are a team of specialists in ozone technologies. Our mission is to make disinfection safe, effective and accessible for businesses of any size.
content.p2: We believe the future belongs to eco-friendly technologies that do not harm the environment and human health. Ozonation is exactly such a technology.
